page.title: 13One Saturday in Stutton
page.content: When I got up I went downstairs and had my breakfast and then I got dressed. Later on in the morning I telephoned Dan to see if I could play with him and I could. When I got to Dan's garden. Dan, Robert, John and Andreas had disappeared. I looked behind a hedge and saw them eating blackberries so I ran round and joined them. Then we decided to play 'Army' so we each had a toy gun. We had teams of three and two people. John's team went and hid. We counted to 500 and then went to look for them. We found them alright, well, they found us and shot us! Then I had to go home for dinner. In the afternoon we went shopping in Ipswich and then went swimming at Crown Pools. In the evening I watched television until I went to bed at 9pm.
